apartments.description: A cozy 2-bedroom apartment located downtown with a fully equipped kitchen and a balcony.
Spacious 3-bedroom apartment in a quiet neighborhood, close to public transport and schools.
Modern 1-bedroom loft with large windows and a beautiful city view, located near restaurants and shops.
Luxury 4-bedroom penthouse with a private rooftop terrace and high-end appliances.
Affordable studio apartment perfect for students, within walking distance of the university.
Charming 2-bedroom apartment in a historic building, featuring wooden floors and original architecture.
